Req: Aerosoft MA Barajas with runways updated!

Thanx so much SnakEye! you are my Santaclause:)) works 100%. I'll buy the bird to support the developer & our hobby. Just wanted to test the bird, been burned so many times before! & it's a worthy pay ware addon of my money.
Marry Christmas & Happy New Year to all!

A little feedback about this addon...
-Spent 3 hours setting throttles, and finally found a solution from 3rd party ppl, not from Aerosoft.
-"FPS friendly" (that's what they say) my hairy ass, I can run the NGX at 30FPS constant but with this one I was under 20 most of the time.
-Camera cycles suck.
-After completing my flight got the most unrealistic touchdown I ever had.
Advice: If you are planning to buy it don't waste your money here, save it for the FSLabs one which should be with us in a few months.

Thank you so much ! You're the best Snake Eye ! :D
